## Problem 1

### 3 points possible
a.  0.5 pt - load data
b.  0.5 pt - str
c.  1 pt - select columns
d.  1 pt - add calculated column

### part a

```{r cache=TRUE}
crania <-read.table("http://hompal-stats.wabarr.com/datasets/Howell_craniometry.txt", sep=",", header=TRUE, na.strings = 0)
head(crania)
```

### part b

```{r}
str(crania)
```


### part c & d in one step with pipes

```{r message=F}
library(tidyverse)
subsetCrania <- 
  crania %>%
  select(XFB, OBB, SIS) %>%
  mutate(prod = XFB * OBB * SIS)
subsetCrania
```

## Problem 2

### points possible
a. 1pt means
c. 2pts figure

### Part a

```{r}
library(dplyr)
crania %>% 
  group_by(Population, Sex) %>%
  summarise(meanGOL = mean(GOL), meanXCB = mean(XCB), meanZYB=mean(ZYB), meanSIS = mean(SIS))
```

### Part b



```{r cache=TRUE, echo=TRUE,  fig.width=16, fig.height=9}
library(ggplot2)
qplot(GOL, BBH, data=crania) + facet_wrap(~Population) + theme_bw(20)
```
